Text.val: 01.02.2013 SH SCR17924 Removed parameter BAD310.PI.SELECTION
22.01.2012 SH SCR17880 Fixed error SQL0338 “JOIN predicate not valid”

SQL_STMT_U.val: select min(CSEC701_EXPIRY) from flprod/CSEC where CSEC_ADMNO = 1 and CSEC_CLNTNO = 7093 and CSEC701_TYPE in(21,22) and not(CSEC701_EXPIRY is null)

select DRIH_ADMNO, DRIH_CLNTNO, DRIH_DATSTARTING from flprod/DRIH where DRIH_DEBH_NO = 1052725 and exists(select * from flprod/ CLNT a where CLNT101_ADMNO = DRIH_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DRIH_CLNTNO and exists(select * from flprod/CLNT b where b.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = a.CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO and b.CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = a.CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO and b.CLNT101_ADMNO = 1 and b.CLNT102_CLNTNO = 1636)) order by DRIH_DATSTARTING desc
select count(*) from flprod/T203 where T203_TRADECATEGORY1='F' and T203_RUNNUMBER = 11883

select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from flprod/INVO where INVO_ADMNO = 1 and INVO_CLNTNO = 197 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and case when INVO_DUEDATE >= INVO_SCHEDULEDATE then INVO_DUEDATE else INVO_SCHEDULEDATE end < '2013-05-15'

select cast (sum (CMON_CURRBALSTOCKFACILITY) as decimal (13,2)) from flprod/CMON where CMON_YEAR = 2013 and CMON_MONTH = 5 and CMON_CURRENCY = 'EUR' and exists (select * from flprod/CLNT where CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = 197 and CLNT101_ADMNO = CMON_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = CMON_CLNTNO) and CMON_CLNTNO <> 197

select COUT_ADMNO, COUT_CLNTNO, COUT_LINENO from :1/COUT, :1/CLNT a where COUT_ADMNO = a.CLNT101_ADMNO and COUT_CLNTNO = a.CLNT102_CLNTNO and a.CLNT101_ADMNO = a.CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO and a.CLNT102_CLNTNO = a.CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO and COUT202_REPORTTYPE ='RXF' and exists (select * from :1/SCHT where SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV < ':2' and SCHT_BOOKED = 'Y' and (SCHT_ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO) in (select b.CLNT101_ADMNO, b.CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT b where b.CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = COUT_ADMNO and b.CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = COUT_CLNTNO))

Text.val: Author : Bujakowski Grzegorz
-- if PI.FREQUENCY = blank then PI.FREQUENCY = W
-- if PI.DATE = blank then PI.DATE = GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE
-- V.DATEFROM = PI.DATE if PI.FREQUENCY = D
-- V.DATEFROM = 01.MM.YYYY from PI.DATE if PI.FREQUENCY = M
-- V.DATEFROM = PI.DATE – 7 days if PI.FREQUENCY = W
-- There are rows

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT110_NAME1, HUSR_NAME, CLNT208_HGROUP, CREM_TYPE, CREM_NOTICE from flprod/CREM, flprod/CLNT, flprod/ADMN, flprod/HUSR where CREM_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CREM_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and HUSR_ID = CLNT205_EMP_CONTACT and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and CLNT212_FCI = 0 order by CREM_ADMNO, CREM_CLNTNO, CREM_TYPE for fetch only
select DCLV_NINVOK, DCLV_NINVNOTOK, DCLV_NINVNOTVERIFIED from flprod/dclv where dclv_admno = 3 and dclv_clntno = 30045 and dclv_debh_no = 1435489 and dclv_datverification = '2014-02-14';

select CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO as ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO as CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end as DEBTOR, min(CLNT109_ATT_CURR), min(CLNT212_CONFIDENTIAL), min(CLNT407_FINANCECODE), min(CLNT411_MINFINANCELIMIT), min(CLNT203_OFFICE), min(CLNT804_RISKRATING), min(B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY), min(B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT), min(CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK), min(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT), min(CCRY501_REINSCLNT_INFS_CODE), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVASPECACCH) as decimal(13,2)), case when min(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT) is not null and min(DEBC_CREDITLIMIT) = 0 then 0 when max(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) > 0 then cast(max(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal (13,2)) when min(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) is not null and min(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) = 0 then 0 when max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) > 0 then cast(max(DEBC_REINSURANCELIM) / min(REIN.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) * min(REOUT.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) as decimal(13,2)) when max(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT) > 0 then cast(max(CCRY501_SELFJUDGEMENT) / min(SJIN.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) * min(SJOUT.CURA_EXCHGRATE_FL) as decimal(13,2)) when min(CCRY501_DEBTORSRISK) = 'N' and min(CCRY501_REINSCLNT_INFS_CODE) = '' then cast(max(B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT) as decimal(13,2)) else 0 end as LIMIT from flprod/debc join flprod/CLNT on CLNT407_FINANCECODE in ('A','B','C') and CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT <> 2 and CLNT402_ADVANCE > 0 join flprod/ADMN on ADMN_NO = CLNT101_ADMNO and ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN_TESTCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = 'N' join flprod/DEBB on DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO join flprod/DEBH A on A.DEBH_NO = DEBC_DEBH join flprod/DEBH B on B.DEBH_NO = case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end and B.DEBH_DEBTORTYPE <> 1 and B.DEBH_NO > 2 join flprod/CCRY on CCRY308_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CCRY308_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CCRY308_COUNTRY = B.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY left outer join flprod/CURA REIN on REIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REIN.CURA_CODE = DEBC_REINSURANCELIMCURR left outer join flprod/CURA REOUT on REOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and REOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY left outer join flprod/CURA SJIN on SJIN.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJIN.CURA_CODE = CLNT109_ATT_CURR left outer join flprod/CURA SJOUT on SJOUT.CURA_ADMNO = ADMN_ADMNO_RATES and SJOUT.CURA_CODE = ADMN_CURRENCY
left outer join flprod/GSBU on GSBU_OFFICE = CLNT203_OFFICE and GSBU_ID = 2098 and DEBC_EXPORTLC = case when GSBU_YESNO='Y' then 'N' end and DEBC_EXTERNALGUARANTEE = case when GSBU_YESNO='Y' then 'N' end
where DEBC_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and DEBC_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and (DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH > 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT = 0 or DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM = 0 or DEBC_REINSURANCELIM > 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT = 0 or B.DEBH_REFERENCELIMIT > 0) group by CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end order by CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO, CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO, case when A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH=0 then A.DEBH_NO else A.DEBH_LEGALOWNER_DEBH end for fetch only
select * FROM flprod/TDIV WHERE TDIV_CALLPROG='BID700' and TDIV_DEBC_NO=28420

select * FROM flprod/TDIV WHERE TDIV_CALLPROG='BID700' and TDIV_DEBC_NO=28420 and exists(select * from flprod/INVO left outer join flprod/MARK on MARK_CODE = INVO_MARKCODESPEC where INVO_NO = TDIV_INVO_NO and (INVO_CODPAYMENTDIFF='Y' or INVO_CODDISCOUNTDIFFERENCE='Y' or INVO_CODDRAFT ='Y' or case when INVO_MARKCODESPEC > 0 then MARK_URSLIST end = 'Y' or case when INVO_ADMNO = 3 then INVO_MARKCODESPEC end = 14))

Text.val: Check if NFIN_INVOICENO contains only values 0-9
Test is row exists in CLIENT_INVOICENO_MARKCODE
Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM contains only values 0-9
Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_UNTIL contains only values 0-9

ExpSyntax.val: Len (Trim ({0,4}))=1 AND Len (Trim ({0,5}))=1 AND Trim ({0,4})=Trim ({0,5}) AND InStr ('0123456789ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ',Trim ({0,4}))=0 AND InStr (Trim ({27,5}),Trim ({0,4}))>0

Text.val: Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_FROM contains only values 0-9
Check is CLIM_INVOICENO_UNTIL contains only values 0-9

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT203_OFFICE from :1/DEBC, :1/CLNT where CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and DEBC_DEBH = :2 and DEBC_DATDELETED is null group by CLNT203_OFFICE

Text.val: -- If V.SUM =< GSBU_AMOUNT set v.MQ252 = N else call batch job BMQ005 to store a new message in the MQ

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (abs(DEBB_ACTINVAH)) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DEBC, :1/DEBB where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and DEBC_NO in (select a.DEBC_NO from :1/DEBC a, :1/CLNT where CLNT101_ADMNO = a.DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = a.DEBC_CLNTNO and CLNT203_OFFICE = ':2' and a.DEBC_DEBH = :3 and a.DEBC_DATDELETED is null)
update :1/cdep set cdep_specinterestcond = 'N' where cdep_admno between 21 and 25 and cdep_specinterestcond = 'Y' and not(cdep_datedeleted is null)
